thread.title: A Wave of New Works by Gerhard Richter
thread.title_full: A Wave of New Works by Gerhard Richter - WSJ

author: J.S. Marcus
title: A Wave of New Works by Gerhard Richter
text:
German artist Gerhard Richter turns 85 next Thursday, and a museum in his home city Cologne will use the opportunity to mount an eye-catching birthday celebration: an exhibition bursting with his new paintings.
What’s unusual is that Mr. Richter will unveil 26 abstract works all completed in 2016 in a museum rather than in a commercial gallery. The artist’s highly productive 85th year recalls the “late style” of artists from Titian to Picasso. For centuries, the twilight of an artist’s life was often looked down on as...
